external_games.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge
summary: Yu-Gi-Oh! Power of Chaos: Kaiba the Revenge is the second Yu-Gi-Oh! game for PC also it's the second one of the three Power of Chaos game series. The game adds features 466 cards, including the 155 cards from the previous game, Yugi the Destiny and 311 new cards.
